title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 56.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Section
220
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law authorizes the commissioner to permit the
installation and use of equipment which he determines will reduce accidents, injuries and fatalities or otherwise contribute to highway safety, notwithstanding any other provision of law. The commissioner is further
authorized to establish standards for the manufacture and use of any equipment
for which such an exemption is granted. Equipment specified in the following
sections of this Part has been determined by the commissioner to contribute to
highway safety, and the exemptions specified are granted to such equipment, subject to any standards specified therein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
56.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
